description: '''Goregrind''' is a fusion genre of [[grindcore]] and [[death metal]]. British band [[Carcass (band)|Carcass]] are commonly credited for the emergence of the genre with their first two albums [[Reek of Putrefaction]] and [[Symphonies of Sickness]], along with [[Repulsion (band)|Repulsion]] and [[Impetigo]] with their debut albums [[Horrified]] and [[Ultimo Mondo Cannibale|Ultimo Mondo Cannibale]]. Goregrind is recognizable by its heavily edited, [[pitch-shifted]] vocals, abrasive musicianship rooted in grindcore, and lyrical emphasis on gore, death, [[pathology]], and rape.
